['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Candidates must have the technical skills to transform, manipulate and store data, the analytical skills to relate the data to the business processes that generates it and the communication skills to disseminate information regarding the availability, quality, and other characteristics of the data to a diverse audience.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa03+ years of writing object-oriented code in in Python', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Results oriented with the ability to multi-task and adjust priorities when necessary\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa02+ years of experience in implementing machine learning algorithms (regression, dimensionality reduction, recommendation systems, outlier detection, and predictive models)', 'In this dual responsibility role,\xa0Data Engineer and Architecture\xa0will also serve as the Machine Learning Engineer responsible for hands-on deployments of data science artifacts into business workflows and will work closely with the Data Scientists to understand the inputs and outputs of the models. The engineer will also establish the testing criteria for validating the model deployments in collaboration with the Data Scientist and VP Data Strategy.\xa0The engineer must have an understanding of model deployment pipelines incorporating data from internal systems and third party sources. Expertise in Linux, SQL, Hadoop, and Spark is essential for this role. The engineer should be able to write Python code using object oriented software engineering principles and delivering modularized, reusable code.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05+ years’ experience in object-oriented programming and design patterns.', 'EXPERIENCE AND SKILLS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Demonstrate a passion for learning new skills and creating best practices and standards within the organization.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience deploying on the Microsoft Azure platform, certification is preferred but not required.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BA, BS, MS, PHD in Computer Science and Engineering', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in leading projects from incubation to production deployments', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Determine business solutions and translate into actionable steps\xa0for other staff on the team.', 'The\xa0Data Engineer and Architecture\xa0will partner with the VP Data Strategy and the IT organization to enable deployment of Data Science assets (data, model, business rules) into business workflows. The\xa0Data Engineer and Architecture\xa0is responsible for creating playbooks and modular code to enable adoption of best practices within the Data Science organization. This role is responsible for contributing to the development of the data architecture, assisting in the selection of tools and mastering the use of selected tools to advance the objectives of the company. This role will be responsible for deploying the architecture on the Microsoft Azure cloud platform. The\xa0Data Engineer and Architecture\xa0consults on use cases to provide a high level view of cost, time and effort associated with project objectives and delivery goals. This role is responsible for guiding the Data Science practice to allow for faster, cheaper, consistent, and reliable deployments while enabling transparency and reproducibility of modeling assets.', 'Further, this role will have a responsibility for adopting, and contributing to, the data governance model established by the parent company (TDC).\xa0In this role he or she will collaborate with colleagues throughout the organization to adopt and adhere to the standards developed by the organization.']

job_title: Researcher III – Algae Engineering and Biotechnology
job_text: ['', 'Posting Title ', 'What To Expect', 'Demonstrates complete understanding and wide application of scientific technical procedures, principles, theories and concepts in the field. General knowledge of other related disciplines. Demonstrates leadership in one or more areas of team, task or project lead responsibilities. Demonstrated experience in management of projects. Very good technical writing, interpersonal and communication skills. Must have demonstrated experience with microbial or algae biotechnology, strain engineering, strong microbiology and photophysiology background, ideally GC/MS and LC/MS analysis, including hands-on operation of the instrumentation, and data reduction and interpretation.  Have a basic understanding of bioinformatics and a basis of coding in a data analysis computing language, such as R. Strong writing skills, organizational skills, critical data review and communication in small and large group setting. Demonstrate a successful track record of non-model algae genetic engineering, vector design and genetic tractability of a range of different organisms, ideally including the expression of metabolically active genes to modulate intracellular physiology.In depth understanding and successful experimental record of primary carbon assimilation biochemical and metabolic pathways is required in particular in single cell photosynthetic organisms such as algae.Additionally, the candidate needs to have a basic understanding of metabolomics of photosynthetic organisms, including experimental design and statistical interpretation of experiments.', ' Submission Guidelines ', 'Design and execute laboratory experiments for strain development for algae productivity improvements using advanced molecular biology tools, isolate and quantify high-value products from algae as well as biofuel precursor fractions from a variety of biomass samples, perform multiple chemical analyses (including GC/MS and LC/MS) on these fractions, and interpret and communicate the results.', 'Additional Required Qualifications', 'Contribute to research and development activities within the Bioenergy Science and Technology Directorate by developing advanced molecular tools for cell biochemistry manipulation optimization for both biofuel and bioproduct optimization.', 'Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination', ' Hours Per Week ', ' Have a basic understanding of bioinformatics and a basis of coding in a data analysis computing language, such as R. Strong writing skills, organizational skills, critical data review and communication in small and large group setting. ', 'Focus includes but not limited to non-model algae genetic engineering, vector design and genetic tractability of a range of different organisms, ideally including the expression of metabolically active genes to modulate intracellular physiology.', 'An inherent part of the job involves team interactions, build effective teams and enhance the technical and professional skills of junior team members, such as undergraduate and graduate interns.', ' E -Verify www.dhs.gov/E-Verify |For information about right to work, click here for English or here for Spanish.', 'Write multiple peer-reviewed manuscripts per year, including conference dissemination of results in presentations.', ' Location ', 'EEO is the Law', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Basic Qualifications ', ' Must have demonstrated experience with microbial or algae biotechnology, strain engineering, strong microbiology and photophysiology background, ideally GC/MS and LC/MS analysis, including hands-on operation of the instrumentation, and data reduction and interpretation. ', 'Demonstrate a successful track record of non-model algae genetic engineering, vector design and genetic tractability of a range of different organisms, ideally including the expression of metabolically active genes to modulate intracellular physiology.', '40 Job Description', ' Position Type ', 'Demonstrates complete understanding and wide application of scientific technical procedures, principles, theories and concepts in the field. General knowledge of other related disciplines. Demonstrates leadership in one or more areas of team, task or project lead responsibilities. Demonstrated experience in management of projects. Very good technical writing, interpersonal and communication skills.', ' Reasonable Accommodations ', 'Design and execute laboratory experiments for strain development for algae productivity improvements using advanced molecular biology tools, isolate and quantify high-value products from algae as well as biofuel precursor fractions from a variety of biomass samples, perform multiple chemical analyses (including GC/MS and LC/MS) on these fractions, and interpret and communicate the results.Write multiple peer-reviewed manuscripts per year, including conference dissemination of results in presentations.Contribute to collaborative proposal writing with senior staff for the formation of new proposals and business development opportunities.Contribute to research and development activities within the Bioenergy Science and Technology Directorate by developing advanced molecular tools for cell biochemistry manipulation optimization for both biofuel and bioproduct optimization.Focus includes but not limited to non-model algae genetic engineering, vector design and genetic tractability of a range of different organisms, ideally including the expression of metabolically active genes to modulate intracellular physiology.Advanced continuous monitoring of cell physiology in the context of rapid and real-time CO2 uptake monitoring.Contribute as part of a larger team involved with algae biotechnology for strain and process improvements in terms of carbon capture and storage.An inherent part of the job involves team interactions, build effective teams and enhance the technical and professional skills of junior team members, such as undergraduate and graduate interns.Frequently contributes to the development of new theories and methods.Displays a substantial and significant record of achievement through reports, publications, intellectual property, or technical products.', 'Frequently contributes to the development of new theories and methods.', 'Contribute as part of a larger team involved with algae biotechnology for strain and process improvements in terms of carbon capture and storage.', ' E -Verify www.dhs.gov/E-Verify ', Policy ', 'In depth understanding and successful experimental record of primary carbon assimilation biochemical and metabolic pathways is required in particular in single cell photosynthetic organisms job_title: Research Scientist - Bioassay - Method Development GMP
job_text: ['', 'Primary Responsibilities', ' Develop and qualify biophysical analytical methods for characterizing impurities in cell therapy product.', ' Support daily operations by maintaining and qualifying controls and critical reagents.', ' Experienced in development, optimization, and validation of biophysical and biochemical methods in a GLP or GMP environment. ', ' Ability to mentor others on technical operating systems ', '  Demonstrated method development experience in impurity profiling using biophysical and analytical chemical methods   Experience in a GMP regulated Lab is strongly desired.   Experienced in development, optimization, and validation of biophysical and biochemical methods in a GLP or GMP environment.   Extensive hands-on experience with HPLC/UPLC, LC-MS, DLS and Zetasizer   Hands-on experience in ELISAs, Western blotting and other protein-based technique.   Experience qualifying, validating and transferring analytical methods to a QC lab setting.   Proven track record in method development, including experimental design, execution and evaluation.   Strong understanding of GMP and ICH guidelines.   Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, meet deadlines, and prioritize work on multiple projects.   Strong communication skills in technical writing and oral presentation.   Ability to carefully follow existing methods and SOPs.   Ability to maintain meticulous records and documentation.   Strong sense of responsibility, accountability, and integrity.   Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.   Strong capabilities in experimental design and execution.   Ability to work independently   Familiar with USP and other compendia   Full understanding of laboratory requirements, SOPs, ICH guidelines, USP requirements and FDA guidance   Ability to independently optimize analytical methods   Ability to independently perform root cause analysis for method investigations   Proven technical writing skills   Effective written and oral communication skills as well as presentation skills   Time management and project management skills   Ability to mentor others on technical operating systems   Ability to independently review and understand project proposals/plans   Ability to work in a collaborative work environment with a team  ', ' Proven track record in method development, including experimental design, execution and evaluation. ', ' Strong communication skills in technical writing and oral presentation. ', 'Job Description', ' Full understanding of laboratory requirements, SOPs, ICH guidelines, USP requirements and FDA guidance ', ' Previous experience that provides the knowledge, skills, and abilities to perform the job (comparable to 8+ years). ', ' Ability to independently perform root cause analysis for method investigations ', ' Collaborate with others to handle day to day operation of the laboratory to ensure smooth operation.', ' Maintain accurate and detailed laboratory notebooks in a timely fashion and prepare technical reports, summaries, protocols.', ' Experience qualifying, validating and transferring analytical methods to a QC lab setting. ', ' Proven technical writing skills ', "  Bachelor's degree or equivalent and relevant formal academic / vocational qualification   Previous experience that provides the knowledge, skills, and abilities to perform the job (comparable to 8+ years).   In some cases an equivalency, consisting of a combination of appropriate education, training and/or directly related experience, will be considered sufficient for an individual to meet the requirements of the role.  ", ' Strong understanding of GMP and ICH guidelines. ', 'Job Qualification', ' In some cases an equivalency, consisting of a combination of appropriate education, training and/or directly related experience, will be considered sufficient for an individual to meet the requirements of the role. ', ' Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills. ', ' Strong sense of responsibility, accountability, and integrity. ', " Bachelor's degree or equivalent and relevant formal academic / vocational qualification ", ' Ability to work in a collaborative work environment with a team ', ' Ability to independently review and understand project proposals/plans ', ' Be responsible for the execution, data review, analysis and document writing.', ' Familiar with USP and other compendia ', ' Effective written and oral communication skills as well as presentation skills ', ' Hands-on experience in ELISAs, Western blotting and other protein-based technique. ', ' Ability to work independently ', ' Perform routine testing of samples for characterization and release. This includes HPLC/UPLC, LC/MS, DLS, ELISA, etc.', ' Experience in a GMP regulated Lab is strongly desired. ', ' Ability to independently optimize analytical methods ', ' Strong capabilities in experimental design and execution. ', ' We have a strong will to win - We earn our customer’s trust - We are gamechangers - We do the right thing -We are one PPD', ' Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, meet deadlines, and prioritize work on multiple projects. ', ' Ability to carefully follow existing methods and SOPs. ', ' Design and execute experiments and maintain appropriate consumable inventories to support method development.', ' Extensive hands-on experience with HPLC/UPLC, LC-MS, DLS and Zetasizer ', ' Ability to maintain meticulous records and documentation. animal studies', 'Research Scientist with BSL-4 maximum containment laboratories', 'Why Sabin:', '!', 'Requirements:', 'Do you have extensive', 'Our mission is to make vaccines more accessible, enable innovation and expand immunization across the globe. We seek a future free from vaccine-preventable diseases. We are an innovative, collaborative and engaged team that values accountability, teamwork, partnership and driving impact. We are vaccine champions improving lives through immunization. Sabin staff, management and Board of Trustees are committed to developing a diverse, equitable and inclusive team.', 'Responsibilities:', '•\tProvide technical summaries, reviews, comments and presentations of animal study protocols, data, reports, SOPs from CRO, etc.', '•\tReview and write study reports, as well as monthly and annual reports to funding agencies/funders', 'To be considered, please submit your cover letter and resume via e-mail to\xa0jobs@sabin.org. Please be sure to reference “Principal Research Scientist, R&D” in the subject line. Your cover letter should: (1) address the reasons for your interest in this position; and (2) describe the knowledge, skills and abilities you would bring to the Sabin Vaccine Institute based on the responsibilities in the job description; (3) your vaccine industry work experience. No phone calls, please. Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.', 'you', 'Are you an experienced ', 'If so, we are looking for ', 'Sabin is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to their race, color, religion, national origin, ancestry, age, disability or genetic information, sex (including gender identity, pregnancy or sexual orientation), marital status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state or local laws.', '•\tStrong interpersonal skills; ability to work across the organization, building strong relationships with colleagues over geographical distance', 'The Sabin Vaccine Institute (Sabin) is seeking a Pre-Clinical Principal Research Scientist to join its Vaccine Research & Development (R&D) Team. They will work closely with the Vice President (VP) of Non-Clinical Development, providing technical supervision to Sabin’s pre-clinical CROs to support Sabin R&D pre-clinical studies. Initially, Sabin’s R&D projects are focused on prophylactic candidate vaccines to protect against Ebola Sudan and Marburg virus funded by the U.S. Government. Sabin is proactively working to grow its project pipeline as we execute our long-term strategy and develop new project opportunities.', '•\tExperience with IND application, able to assist with application package preparation in pre-clinical related sections', '•\tProficiency in all Microsoft Office applications and relevant statistical analysis software such as GraphPad and JMP', ' regulatory knowledge about vaccine license approval based on animal rule', '•\tStrong attention to detail, ability to manage complex tasks, ability to analyze and solve problems', 'Do you have extensive regulatory knowledge about vaccine license approval based on animal rule?', '•\tExperience with BSL- 4 maximum containment laboratories, understanding of immunological correlates of protection, and knowledge of product development under the animal rule regulatory pathway is desirable', 'Are you an experienced Research Scientist with BSL-4 maximum containment laboratories?', 'Salary commensurate with qualifications and experience. Sabin Vaccine Institute has a generous benefits package (see https://www.sabin.org/careers/employee-benefits).', '•\tProven experience with infection disease, non-human primate animal model development, pre-clinical immunogenicity, efficacy and toxicology studies for evaluating vaccine candidates']

['\xa06+', 'Summit, NJ\xa0', ' ', '\xa0 Remote Job - Medical Review Physician\xa0', 'JOB ID # 20-36392 ', '.\xa0', 'Pharmaceutical Industry', 'Immediate need for a Job title\xa0 Remote Job - Medical Review Physician\xa0experience in the Pharmaceutical Industry. This is\xa06+ Months Contract position for  Summit, NJ\xa0   Location.\xa0Please review the job description below:  ', 'Pharmaceutical\xa0', " the addition of myeloid (AML/MDS) experience if possibleDescription:Experience Required:- MD required (or x-US equivalent) functional assignment as Clinical Trial Physician- 5 or more years Industry experience and/or clinical trials experience requiredQualifications Desired:- Subspecialty training in applicable therapeutic area- Expertise in using the scientific method to test hypotheses, including statistical design, analysis, and interpretation- Knowledge of the drug development process- Knowledge of the components needed for an effective clinical plan and protocols- Strong leadership skills with proven ability to lead and work effectively in a team environmentExpected Areas of Competence:- Matrix management responsibilities across the internal and external network- Manages Phase 1 – Phase 3 studies and manages multiple complex studies with demonstrated decision making capabilities- Provides medical and scientific expertise to cross-functional BMS colleagues- Ability to present clearly in scientific and clinical settingsScope of Responsibility:1. Medical Monitoring:- Contributes to and is key member of a high performing Study Delivery Team (SDT) and may be a member of the Clinical Development Team (CDT)- Conducts medical data review of trial data, including eligibility review.- Responsible for site interactions in partnership with the Clinical Scientist for medical questions and education (including safety management guidelines- Responsible for assessment of key safety-related serious adverse events in partnership with GPVE and oversees safety narratives.- Collaborates with CS and inputs into protocols, providing medical strategic oversight in protocol development (input on inclusion/exclusion criteria and other safety-related clinical considerations).- Fulfills GCP and compliance obligations for clinical conduct and maintains all required training for same2. Clinical development expertise & strategy:- In collaboration with the CDL, designs and develops clinical plans and protocols with a strong strategic focus based on knowledge of the asset/drug, disease area and relevant science in order to meet regulatory and disease strategy targets. Leads the analysis of benefit/risk for clinical development protocols in a matrix team environment working in partnership with Clinical Scientists (CS).- Provides input into CTP and overall clinical development plan strategy- Provides medical accountability and oversight of a group of studies- Partners with CS to support executional delivery of studies (eg, site activation, enrollment status, as well as adjudication for protocol violations, significant, non-significant deviations etc).- Identifies and builds relationships with principal investigators. Identifies and cultivates thought leaders (TLs) in order to gain their inputs on emerging science in drug and biomarker research, disease knowledge and design of clinical development studies and programs.- Maintains a strong medical/scientific reputation within the disease area. Has in depth knowledge of etiology, natural history, diagnosis, and treatment of the disorder. Keeps up-to-date in the disease area via attendance at scientific conferences and ongoing review of the literature.- Keeps abreast of development and regulatory issues related to other competitive or relevant compounds in development and how our portfolio fits into the competitive landscape- Provides ongoing medical education in partnership with CS, protocol specific training, to support study team, investigators, and others.- Provides strategic input into broad functional best practices and process improvement efforts.3. Health authority interactions & publications :- Contributes to key Health Authority interactions and advisory board meetings as Clinical Trial Physician- Authors/drafts clinical content for CSRs, regulatory reports, briefing books and submission documents to support closure, clinical narratives, reporting and filing of the study in partnership with CSs.Reporting and Developmental Value:- Reports to Clinical Development Lead (CDL) or CTP who partners with GPV&E physicians in the ongoing review of safety data and potential safety signals, particularly clinical safety data arising from active and completed clinical trials- Broad experience in management of and participation in functional and cross functional based matrix teams- Gain a broad perspective of the pharmaceutical development process and the company's development strategy- Hands-on exposure in the development and execution of clinical development plans   ", ' Months', 'JOB ID # 20-36392  ', '****Remote Job****** ', 'Our client is a leading Pharmaceutical\xa0Organization and we are currently interviewing to fill this and other similar Contract positions. Qualified candidates should apply online for immediate consideration.']

job_title: Senior Research Associate, Cell Therapy / Genome Engineering
job_text: ['', 'This is a lab-based research associate role where you will be responsible for conducting experiments, collecting, managing, and analyzing experimental data, interpreting results, and preparing presentations for internal and external meetings and publications', 'Company Description', 'Strong experience in genome engineering technology (e.g. CRISPR/Cas9) and cell line engineering is highly desired', 'Work in the pre-clinical discovery team that is developing a proprietary human hepatocyte cell therapy', 'Contemporary expertise and broad experience in cell culture, molecular biology and protein chemistry techniques required, including but not limited to flow cytometry, cell-based assays, ELISA, immunoblot, immunocytochemistry', 'What You Will Do', 'Position Summary', 'Qualifications', 'BS or MS degree in a biological science discipline with 3-6 years of relevant experience in cell therapy, genome engineering, and/or cellular immunology, in industry or academia', 'Excellent data analysis skills and experience with a variety of scientific software applications (e.g. Microsoft Office; FlowJo; Prism or JMP; Adobe Photoshop)', 'Demonstrated ability to follow protocols and document laboratory procedures/experiments with great attention to detail', ' BS or MS degree in a biological science discipline with 3-6 years of relevant experience in cell therapy, genome engineering, and/or cellular immunology, in industry or academia Contemporary expertise and broad experience in cell culture, molecular biology and protein chemistry techniques required, including but not limited to flow cytometry, cell-based assays, ELISA, immunoblot, immunocytochemistry Strong experience in genome engineering technology (e.g. CRISPR/Cas9) and cell line engineering is highly desired Strong experience in cellular immunology and developing human immune cell-based assays is highly desired Experience in human stem cell differentiation is a plus Experience in animal model handling or in vivo study is a plus Demonstrated ability to follow protocols and document laboratory procedures/experiments with great attention to detail Demonstrated ability to work efficiently in a team-oriented environment with supervision Excellent data analysis skills and experience with a variety of scientific software applications (e.g. Microsoft Office; FlowJo; Prism or JMP; Adobe Photoshop) Excellent verbal and written communication skills and the ability to interpret, summarize, and present scientific results in a clear, concise, accurate manner to both technical and non-technical audiences', 'Experience in animal model handling or in vivo study is a plus', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills and the ability to interpret, summarize, and present scientific results in a clear, concise, accurate manner to both technical and non-technical audiences', ' Work in the pre-clinical discovery team that is developing a proprietary human hepatocyte cell therapy This is a lab-based research associate role where you will be responsible for conducting experiments, collecting, managing, and analyzing experimental data, interpreting results, and preparing presentations for internal and external meetings and publications You will be under direct scientific supervision of a scientist; but strong candidate is asked to be highly organized and have the self-confidence to work independently in planned studies ', 'Strong experience in cellular immunology and developing human immune cell-based assays is highly desired', 'Experience in human stem cell differentiation is a plus', 'Demonstrated ability to work efficiently in a team-oriented environment with supervision', 'You will be under direct scientific supervision of a scientist; but strong candidate is asked to be highly organized and have the self-confidence to work independently in planned studies']

the ability to work with non-technical customers to solve problemsDemonstrated an ability to thrive in the ambiguity of a dynamic, start-up environment to iterate fast', 'Strong coding skills in Python and SQL', 'Data visualization experience using R, Python, d3.js or Tableau', 'Passion for large-scale data analysis', 'Experience implementing machine learning and data science workloads', 'Experience with Google Data Studio, BigQuery, and other Google tools', 'Work with operations leaders, program managers, and other analysts to design effective ways of summarizing and identifying trends from large amounts of data', 'Build and maintain dashboards, reports, and visualization toolsWork with operations leaders, program managers, and other analysts to design effective ways of summarizing and identifying trends from large amounts of dataCollaborate closely with the infrastructure team to effectively organize our data and build data extraction and analysis pipelines', 'Who We Are', 'Nuro is a robotics start-up whose mission is to accelerate the benefits of robotics for everyday life. We have an elite team of entrepreneurs and engineers, designers, and scientists. We believe AI and robotics are at the cusp of transforming daily life and we are dedicated to building meaningful products with this technology. Join us and play a critical role in our mission.', 'In this role, you will play a major role in analyzing & visualizing large amounts of operational data and building a platform that enables the Operations team. This position demands broad expertise in data analysis and visualization, social skills to work with internal customers, and determined execution.', 'Bonus Points', 'Build and maintain dashboards, reports, and visualization tools', 'About the Role']

['', 'Lead a team in the development of new platform technologies and methodologies that improve Visterra’s ability to discover therapeutic antibodies and characterize their impact on disease processes. Examples include scRNA-seq, microfluidic droplet-based assays, yeast surface display-based methods and NGS-related methods.Operationalize scRNA-seq and related methods, with application to a variety of animal model and patient samples, to facilitate deeper understanding of immuno-/kidney- disease biology and relevant cellular and molecular mechanisms.Collaborate across functional teams in developing experimental strategies, optimizing methods, and interpreting data for translational/research studies using scRNA-seq and other experimental platform technologies.Identify opportunities for enhancements in platform technologies and devise strategies to integrate new capabilities into existing workflows.Coordinate closely with computational biology team in analysis of large datasets to extract and interpret key biological/immunological features relevant to disease processes and therapeutic mechanisms.Independently analyze scientific results, troubleshoot methods, conceive creative solutions, and extract key findings.Monitor developments in academic literature and the biotech field of new technologies, and aid in identifying and creating new technology opportunities of technologies to improve Visterra’s research workflows and capabilities.Supervise and mentor research associates.Manage activities at contract research organizations (CROs).', 'Working knowledge of immunology.', 'Experience with therapeutic antibodies and/or biologics.', 'Coordinate closely with computational biology team in analysis of large datasets to extract and interpret key biological/immunological features relevant to disease processes and therapeutic mechanisms.', 'Excellent critical thinking and experimental troubleshooting skills.', 'Summary', 'Operationalize scRNA-seq and related methods, with application to a variety of animal model and patient samples, to facilitate deeper understanding of immuno-/kidney- disease biology and relevant cellular and molecular mechanisms.', 'Collaborate across functional teams in developing experimental strategies, optimizing methods, and interpreting data for translational/research studies using scRNA-seq and other experimental platform technologies.', 'Requirements', 'Experience with scRNA-seq, transcriptomics, BCR/TCR repertoire analyses, single-cell methods, NGS and related methods is especially relevant.', 'Experience managing scientists and/or research associates.', 'Experience with scRNA-seq, transcriptomics, BCR/TCR repertoire analyses, single-cell methods, NGS and related methods is especially relevant.Use of flow cytometry and cell sorting (FACS) in the context of immunology or protein engineering.Experience with therapeutic antibodies and/or biologics.Experience conducting original research in cell biology, immunology, target discovery or therapeutic mechanisms of action.Experience managing scientists and/or research associates.', 'Demonstrated experience with using complex molecular biology methods to characterize disease processes in animal model or patient samples.', 'Visterra is a wholly owned subsidiary of Otsuka America, Inc., which is a U.S. holding company subsidiary of Otsuka Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. of Japan.\xa0Visterra has approximately 90 employees, and is located in Waltham, Massachusetts.', 'The ideal candidate should have a Ph.D. in molecular biology, immunology, biochemistry or related field with 3+ years post-doctoral research experience in an industry setting. The successful candidate will be a collaborative team player, an effective manager, a critical thinker and clear communicator. This is a full-time laboratory-based position located at Visterra’s facility in Waltham, MA. ', 'Use of flow cytometry and cell sorting (FACS) in the context of immunology or protein engineering.', 'Visterra is a clinical stage biotechnology company committed to developing innova\xadtive biologic therapies (monoclonal antibodies and therapeutic muteins) for the treatment of kidney diseases, with an immuno-nephrology focus in drug development. Our proprietary technology platform enables the design and engineering of precision antibody or protein-based drug candidates to modulate key disease targets. We are de\xadveloping a robust pipeline of novel therapies for patients with unmet needs.', 'Monitor developments in academic literature and the biotech field of new technologies, and aid in identifying and creating new technology opportunities of technologies to improve Visterra’s research workflows and capabilities.', 'Ph.D. in molecular biology, immunology, biochemistry or related field with 3+ years of post-doctoral research experience in an industry setting, or B.S./M.S. with approximately 15 years of relevant experience.', 'The Senior Scientist, Research reports to the Director, Research is responsible for driving development and execution of innovative experimental platform technologies that augment the broad abilities at Visterra to discover, engineer and characterize therapeutic antibodies that modulate disease processes. A key area is the development and execution of methodologies for deeper understanding of biological, immunological and disease mechanisms using single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) and other technologies. This individual will play a key role in developing these methods and facilitating their distillation to a practice that can be incorporated into Visterra research efforts. This individual will be the technical lead of a team focused on development of new and transformative experimental platform methodologies.', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience conducting original research in cell biology, immunology, target discovery or therapeutic mechanisms of action.', 'Visterra provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and ['', 'One- Lead Data Scientist for the development of our data privacy and persona protection models and implementation within our proprietary platform. relationships with customers in assigned territory', 'Support global sales team by analyzing customer samples on the Blaze system integrated to a mass spectrometer', 'Intabio has an opening for a Field Applications Scientist with a home base in the San Francisco Bay Area. This individual will bring their industry experience to interactions with pharmaceutical and biotechnology customers while presenting data-driven presentations on the Blaze technology when integrated with a mass spectrometer.\xa0\xa0The ideal candidate is both an experienced bench scientist/ applications scientist with a background in drug-discovery sciences and intact mass spectrometry.\xa0\xa0The candidate will be a key member of the Field Applications team and will be responsible for providing both pre- and post-sales applications and technical support to customers.\xa0\xa0The candidate will also work closely with the Sales Team to technically close sales by giving detailed data presentations and by performing on-site and in-house product demonstrations.\xa0\xa0\xa0This position reports to the Director of Sales.', 'Ability to work collaboratively and foster professional, constructive relationships as part of a team while also working independently to produce/ analyze data and meet challenging timelines and goals', 'Key Responsibilities include (but not limited to):', 'PhD degree or equivalent experience in Analytical Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, Biochemistry or related field experience required', 'Provide on-going assay development support and troubleshooting for customers in-person, via phone and email', 'Accompany Sales Representatives on sales calls in customer laboratories to provide technical and applications assistance', 'Help to maintain and increase product usage and support sales efforts through technical presentations and product demonstrations', 'Excellent communication skills for oral presentations, customer discussions and written technical reports required']

Bring these technologies into Oracle ERP applications by doing thorough research on the technology adoption for cloud or on-premise applications.', 'Key Qualifications:', 'Formulate how the roadmap will help in retaining existing customers, acquiring new customers and deepening market penetration by articulating the value proposition.', 'Ability to communicate effectively across different audiences from executive levels to\xa0engineers and end users.', 'Collaborate and work with inter-departmental Oracle teams, customers and business partners across the globe to understand and support Oracle eco system.\xa0', 'Quickly come up to speed on new industries and articulate industry trends, challenges, competitive landscape, and solution footprint that drives industry roadmaps.', 'Strong understanding of the overall IT market, SaaS/Cloud trends and implications.', 'The Advanced Industry Strategy team is chartered with scaling market share within industries that align with overall strategic product direction.\xa0As part of this the team performs industry ranking, product fit analysis, partner business development, and customer success cultivation.\xa0In addition, the team collaborates regularly with product strategy, sales, marketing and the industry solutions group.\xa0Externally the team works with SI and ISV partners to extend reach into the market and customers to build strong relationships.', 'The Oracle ERP product development team is seeking a strong Industry Strategy Manager to focus on articulating the vision for the Oracle ERP products including Cloud applications (ERP Cloud, EPM Cloud, SCM Cloud).\xa0We need an individual who has a customer first approach\xa0to focus on great customer outcomes that allow them to excel by deeply knowing their needs/challenges and helping them become wildly successful with Oracle ERP products. It is also an advisory role to help Oracle product development build industry roadmaps and to understand core product requirements.\xa0Candidates should possess skills leveraging breakthrough technologies, experience going deep into industry needs, and enterprise application and ERP experience, and experience driving customer success.', 'Provide input into product assessment and build roadmaps through industry and competitive analysis, partner/customer/sales input, and technology trends.', 'Work with other subject matter experts to determine product fit for an industry', 'Strategic thinker who can see the big picture but can still execute on detailed plans and get things done.', 'Excellent communication, presentation and knowledge sharing skills, along with content creation experience.', 'Creative in solutioning customer problems/requirements and be able to translate them for other stakeholders.', 'Additional Qualifications (Preferred, but not required):', Construction.Quickly come up to speed on new industries and articulate industry trends, challenges, competitive landscape, and solution footprint that drives industry roadmaps.Work with other subject Bring these technologies into Oracle ERP applications by doing thorough research on the technology adoption for cloud or on-premise applications.', '10 years of experience with Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) development or related area.', 'Experience in a customer facing role such as implementer, product manager, customer success manager, sales or consulting with Oracle ERP productsExperience with Applications Technologies space, building adaptive applications and best in class integrations through AI platform, ChatBots and Machine Learning modelsExperience in industries such as Utilities, Consumer Goods, Food & Beverage, Medical Device, or Professional Services.', 'Experience in multiple industries, preferably Asset Intensive industries such as Oil & Gas, Natural Resources, Engineering & Construction, and Agribusiness.', 'Join the team as an Industry Strategy Manager to influence the vision and execution of these flagship Oracle offerings trusted by thousands of diverse customers from startups to large multi-nationals.', 'Demonstrated abilities to be a liaison between Product Management, Customer and Management teams to understand customer business processes and map it back to Oracle ERP products.', 'Perform industry analysis across a wide variety of markets including, but no limited to Oil & Gas, Natural Resources, and Engineering and Construction.', 'Work effectively and cooperatively with the senior leadership team, across borders, and internal matrix. Partner with the other members of leadership team, to define and drive substantial parts of the customer experience.', 'Industry Strategy Manager', 'Experience in a customer facing role such as implementer, product manager, customer success manager, sales or consulting with Oracle ERP products', 'Industry go to market experience particularly with performing market analysis, identifying industry requirements, developing messaging and value propositions, and sales enablement.', 'Demonstrated broad understanding of Oracle technologies including Machine Learning, Blockchain, IoT, Analytics, and Digital Assistants.', 'Experience in industries such as Utilities, Consumer Goods, Food & Beverage, Medical Device, or Professional Services.', 'Create and deliver presentations via webinars and in person sessions at Oracle conferences.', 'The Industry Strategy Manager position is in the Advanced Industries Strategy team as part of the Oracle ERP Product development organization. It is a growing, dynamic organization that plays a crucial role in innovating and delivering Oracle ERP applications to market. The position’s primary focus is on ERP products that span across Financials, Planning, Projects, Procurement, Supply Chain and Manufacturing along with the supporting application technologies.', 'Division:', 'BS/BE/BTech or Masters degree preferred.', 'Products:', 'Oracle has an integrated suite of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) applications delivered on a cloud based digital platform which allows companies to enable connected, agile, and real-time business processes. Deep industry capabilities coupled with this platform, create the path for companies to transform into a digital enterprise on cloud.', 'ERP product knowledge across a wide range of business processes, such as Procure to Pay, Order to Cash, and Record to Report.', 'Minimum 5 years of product/ industry product manager, and/or industry product marketing involving one of the tier 1 ERP products (Oracle Cloud Applications, Oracle E-Business Suite, preferred).', 'Experience with Applications Technologies space, building adaptive applications and best in class integrations through AI platform, ChatBots and Machine Learning models']

job_text: ['', 'Salary: $150,000 – $300,000+ ', 'Partner with Traders, Quants, Researchers, and Data Scientists to solve their critical data problems ', 'BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science or related field', 'Strong programming background with Python ideally ', 'Responsibilities: ', 'Build/own the firms data pipelines ', 'Build/own the firms data pipelines Build data processing/analytics tools for research and trading Partner with Traders, Quants, Researchers, and Data Scientists to solve their critical data problems ', 'Python Data Engineer |  Elite Hedge Fund  ', 'Interest in working in a fast-paced/high-impact environment ', 'Build data processing/analytics tools for research and trading ', '\xa0 ', 'NYC Based Hedge Fund is looking for Data Engineers to join their team ', 'Salary: ', ' ', '2+ years of experience in Data/Software Engineering, Data Science, or a related field\xa0 Solid understanding of computer science fundamentals, data structures, algorithms, distributed systems, etc. Strong programming background with Python ideally Experience with Big Data/Data Pipelining technologies (ex: Spark, Airflow, Kafka, etc.) Strong problem solving and communication skills Interest in working in a fast-paced/high-impact environment BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science or related field', 'Solid understanding of computer science fundamentals, data structures, algorithms, distributed systems, etc. ', '2+ years of experience in Data/Software Engineering, Data Science, or a related field\xa0 ', 'Strong problem solving and communication skills ', 'Experience with Big Data/Data Pipelining technologies (ex: Spark, Airflow, Kafka, etc.) ']

['', 'Support Analytics Quality Assurance Testing and help develop processes for data mastering and quality control.', 'The perfect candidate for this marketing technology role will use their skills in reverse engineering, data structure, data classification, data analytics, and creative experimental solutions to devise data and business intelligence solutions and workflows to help Wrench Group Marketing achieve its goals and objectives. You will have experience working with Marketing teams and building pipelines geared towards Marketing Attribution and integrating with data repositories, middleware systems and Marketing technology solution vendors.\xa0\xa0You have experience building and deploying solutions that leverages data to improve internal business processes and decision-making.\xa0Specifically, you are familiar with data engineering, warehousing, modeling, and analysis focused in the marketing and digital marketing space with a keen focus on combining first and third-party data to optimize marketing spend.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Translate marketing stakeholder requirements into technical specifications', 'Configure, maintain and support analytics solutions through developing ETL pipelines to marketing data sources (e.g. CDP, CRM, ERP systems, Marketing Automation platforms)', 'Experience with data management systems, both relational and NoSQL (e.g., HBase, Cassandra, MongoDB, Gremlin).', 'Familiar working with 3rd party Attribution partners.', 'Tools and Technology Experience', 'Design, maintain and support system and web analytics solutions using tag management systems and customer data platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Tealium, DDX, etc.)', 'Experience with ETL/ELT, data processing, and data preparation (e.g., Python and/or R, Scala and Go).', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'Understand business context and translate stakeholder needs into data structure, ETL and dashboard requirements.', 'Continue to expand our digital marketing framework to understand the impact of marketing efforts on current and future state strategies.', 'Strong business intuition and ability to understand complex business systems, data architecture, and software design patterns.', 'Ability to break down and communicate highly complex data problems as simple, feasible solutions.', "Bachelor's degree and 3+ years of work experience with a focus on digital marketing analytics in a data engineering, business intelligence, or technical data role supporting Marketing organizations.Experience working on data model design, data logging, and data validation.Experience in building data pipelines, data synthesizing.Strong business intuition and ability to understand complex business systems, data architecture, and software design patterns.Excellent communication skills, particularly when explaining technical matters to less technical co-workers.Strong problem solving and creative-thinking skills.Ability to break down and communicate highly complex data problems as simple, feasible solutions.Ability to communicate technical concepts to non-technical audiences.Ability to translate business requirements into technical specs for developers.", 'Excellent communication skills, particularly when explaining technical matters to less technical co-workers.', 'POSITION SUMMARY ', 'Monitor data infrastructure for anomalies and support rapid resolution for mission-critical reporting.', 'Experience with Adobe Analytics and Google Analytics.', 'Provide on-demand support for issues through troubleshooting, issue identification, resolution, and reporting.', 'Collaborate with teams across the organization to deliver innovative products that help improve content sharing, user-to-user communication and user retention.', 'Experience with ETL/ELT, data processing, and data preparation (e.g., Python and/or R, Scala and Go).Experience developing and maintaining complex SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL preferred) queries as well as a strong understanding of database architecture.Expertise in SQL, especially within cloud-based data warehouses like Azure, Snowflake, Google BigQuery, and Amazon Redshift.Experience with ETL scheduling technologies with dependency checking, such as Airflow, as well as schema design and dimensional data modeling.Experience with Linux/OSX command line, version control software (git), and Python/Ruby.Experience in Microsoft Azure, such as DataBricks and DataFactory Experience with data visualization tools such as DOMO, Microsoft Power BI or TableauExperience with data management systems, both relational and NoSQL (e.g., HBase, Cassandra, MongoDB, Gremlin).Experience working with Google and Facebook Ad Manager APIs.Familiar working with 3rd party (git), and Python/Ruby.', 'Own data import/export pipelines and incorporate into existing workflows to enable reporting and optimization effortsDesign, maintain and support system and web analytics solutions using tag management systems and customer data platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Tealium, DDX, etc.)Collaborate with Wrench Group and third-party resources to translate business requirements into data engineering, working with data architecture to turn them into reality.Configure, maintain and support analytics solutions through developing ETL pipelines to marketing data sources (e.g. CDP, CRM, ERP systems, Marketing Automation platforms)Provide information architecture guidance and implementation for our growing list of proprietary business intelligence and marketing enablement tools.Support Analytics Quality Assurance Testing and help develop processes for data mastering and quality control.Provide on-demand support for issues through troubleshooting, issue identification, resolution, and reporting.Monitor data infrastructure for anomalies and support rapid resolution for mission-critical reporting.Contribute to the building of scalable and reliable systems and platforms that efficiently process first and third data.Collaborate with teams across the organization to deliver innovative products that help improve content sharing, user-to-user communication and user retention.Ensure we have the right data and work with the team to develop workflows to supply the data.Continue to expand our digital marketing framework to understand the impact of marketing efforts on current and future state strategies.', 'Collaborate with Wrench Group and third-party resources to translate business requirements into data engineering, working with data architecture to turn them into reality.', 'Design, build and maintain critical data pipelines and dashboards to ensure highly accurate and reliable business reporting.', 'Experience in building data pipelines, data synthesizing.', 'Ensure we have the right data and work with the team to develop workflows to supply the data.', 'The Marketing Data Engineer will join an information and technology organization whose mandate is to work holistically across multiple Wrench Group Marketing and IT domain areas to build and maintain a foundational data and analytics infrastructure essential to turning data and information into corporate assets, driving Wrench Group’s revenue growth and accelerating customer acquisition and retention. \xa0', 'You will play a key role in defining, designing, building, maintaining, and operating analytics platforms, integrations, reporting pipelines, and data visualization systems within an Agile environment to support the Marketing business function at Wrench Group\xa0As a critical member of the Enterprise Information Management Team and data engineering practice, you will interface with analysts, strategists, C-level executives and technologists to define solutions and collaborate closely with the data architecture and business intelligence practices to develop and implement them.', 'Own end-to-end data flow for all marketing and consumer data especially for Marketing Automation and Content Management data.Understand business context and translate stakeholder needs into data structure, ETL and dashboard requirements.Design, build and maintain critical data pipelines and dashboards to ensure highly accurate and reliable business reporting.Monitor daily execution, diagnose and log issues, and fix business critical pipelines to ensure SLAs are met with internal stakeholders.Bridge gap between business requirements and ETL logic by troubleshooting data discrepancies and implementing scalable solutions.Make data model and ETL code improvements to improve pipeline efficiency and data quality.', 'Ability to communicate technical concepts to non-technical audiences.', 'Experience working with Google and Facebook Ad Manager APIs.', 'Own data import/export pipelines and incorporate into existing workflows to enable reporting and optimization efforts', 'Who You Are', 'Experience in Microsoft Azure, such as DataBricks and DataFactory ', 'Provide information architecture guidance and implementation for our growing list of proprietary business intelligence and marketing enablement tools.', 'Bridge gap between business requirements and ETL logic by troubleshooting data discrepancies and implementing scalable solutions.', 'The Marketing Data Engineer will also create measurement infrastructure by working closely with our marketing, analytics, partnerships, data architecture and business intelligence teams to build best-in-class data pipelines and processes that stitch together complex sets of data stores and drive decisions.\xa0Your work will set the foundational KPIs against how we operate and optimize our Marketing business.\xa0As a Marketing Data Engineer, you will be working on projects that help bridge the gap between the data and business teams.\xa0As a member of the Digital Transformation team, you will be expected to share knowledge, relentlessly problem solve, have a superior work ethic and be an excellent communicator in a fast-paced and complex environment.', ' ', 'Ability to translate business requirements into technical specs for developers.', 'Contribute to the building of scalable and reliable systems and platforms that efficiently process first and third data.', "Bachelor's degree and 3+ years of work experience with a focus on digital marketing analytics in a data engineering, business intelligence, or technical data role supporting Marketing organizations.", 'Experience working on data model design, data logging, and data validation.', 'Monitor daily execution, diagnose and log issues, and fix business critical pipelines to ensure SLAs are met with internal stakeholders.', 'Expertise in SQL, especially within cloud-based data warehouses like Azure, Snowflake, Google BigQuery, and Amazon Redshift.', ' You will regularly deliver value by problem-solving, improving data-intensive processes, and building connections between systems.\xa0From project work to ad hoc issue troubleshooting and resolution, this role requires critical thinking, organization, time management, and strong interpersonal skills.', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', 'You possess a deep sense of curiosity and a passion for building smart data and analytics workflows and communicating data structures and tools throughout the Wrench Group organization. \xa0You are a savvy technology and data expert with the expert ability to translate complex data problems into digestible business solutions both verbally and visually.\xa0You have Data Visualization experience that helps gain business understanding of the data concepts.', 'Own end-to-end data flow for all marketing and consumer data especially for Marketing Automation and Content Management data.', 'Experience developing and maintaining complex SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL preferred) queries as well as a strong understanding of database architecture.', 'Experience with data visualization tools such as DOMO, Microsoft Power BI or Tableau', 'You will work with large volumes of customer/consumer behavior data to build workflows that improve and enrich raw data (steward of the Wrench Group data to information to knowledge to wisdom process).\xa0You will routinely break down and communicate highly complex data problems into simple, feasible hypotheses and solutions, and develop and put into practice extract patterns from large datasets and will transform data into an informational competitive advantage.\xa0\xa0You will seek answers to business questions via hands-on exploration of data sets via Jupyter, SQL, dashboards, statistical analysis, data models and data visualizations.\xa0You will partner with Marketing, Information Technology, geographically dispersed location marketing teams and third-party partners to determine the best approach to data ingestion, data structure, data storage, data presentation, while working with the teams to ensure these are implemented correctly.\xa0\xa0', 'Make data model and ETL code improvements to improve pipeline efficiency and data quality.', 'Experience with ETL scheduling technologies with dependency checking, such as Airflow, as well as schema design and dimensional data modeling.']

['', '· Minimum of 5 years of experience in a similar role', 'In our world, amazing things only happen when people make them happen. If you want to make things happen and do it with a world-class of team of visionaries and doers, we encourage you to apply.', '· Conduct and Report on Data Studies. To advance the analytics, this position is involved in aspects of conducting bench data collection activities and data studies, including developing protocols, conducting data collection from subjects, analyzing collected data and writing reports. An example of this is doing an activity study on treadmills with sensor devices using volunteers.', 'Nice to Have', '· Analytics Platform Troubleshooting. When challenging bugs show up in the performance of the analytics platform product or associated sensor hardware, that require evaluating and analyzing clinical data, the person in this position performs all necessary steps to conduct troubleshooting when assigned to do so.', '· Quality Systems and FDA Validation Work. This position is responsible for participating in the quality management systems of the company and conducting validation testing of algorithms in support of FDA 510(k) or De Novo submissions', 'Job Description', '· Google cloud computing and cloud storage familiarity', '· Advanced literacy to code in at least one of the programming languages of: Python, MATLAB, R', '· Our core values are simple and are defined by integrity, passion and relentless drive toward solving the impossible.', '· 4 or more years of work experience in positions relating to data science or analytics', 'PhysIQ is a transformational leader in applying highly sophisticated technology to solve some of the most pressing problems in healthcare. More specifically, we are forging the frontier of healthcare delivery at the intersection of mobile technology and artificial intelligence. Our team is comprised of veteran technologists and world-class data scientists and our solutions set the market standard for scalability and sophistication. Furthermore, we are implementers with a proven track record of transforming an audacious technological vision into mission-critical solutions for our customers.', 'The person in this job is responsible\xa0for all functions expected of an experienced data scientist in PhysIQ’s research group, namely to develop, advance and validate the analytical technologies of the company; implement, test and deliver production code into the product to generate analytics; implement, test and evaluate competitive and prior art analytics technologies; support statistical analyses of the company’s clinical studies and trials; develop patentable inventions; develop and implement software tools for algorithmic research and clinical statistical analysis; and document analyses, algorithms and related product features. This position is heavily involved in advancing the core analytical capabilities of the company’s products. The mission of the person in this position is to deliver robust analytical methods for productization and to expose and explain phenomena of interest in clinical physiological data.', '· Clinical Data Analysis. This involves analysis of (typically continuous ambulatory) data collected in clinical studies or available from customer de-identified datasets on human subjects accessible to PhysIQ, for any kind of evaluation of results or for any kind of analytics troubleshooting. An example would be analyzing clinical outcomes in a study versus analytical predictions.', '· Generate Specifications and Deliver Production Analytics. This position writes and delivers production code relating to analytical methods in PhysIQ’s products, primarily in Python language; and writes associated documentation. This position is involved in writing, evaluating, critiquing, meeting about, tracking in online systems and updating product specifications about algorithms and on occasion other functionality in the product. Examples include: Writing a formal specification and code for a new algorithm; participating in meetings to review product specifications; contributing ideas for new product features that may become specifications; and updating specifications with approved changes.', '· Publish and Patent. This position should generate publishable research papers and patentable inventions as opportunities arise. This position will also be involved in analyzing the existing patent landscape and developing strategies for staking out patent positions on company technology and avoiding infringement of 3rd party IP.', '· Evaluate Competitive Algorithms. This position implements, evaluates and characterizes the efficacy and weaknesses of competitors’ algorithms. These activities often involve formal written reports on the findings and presentations to other PhysIQ staff.', '· We are a team in its purest definition. We all pull on the rope together, in the same direction, with the same intensity.', '· Experience with version control software', '· Algorithm Development and Testing. This position develops new algorithms or improves existing algorithms for a variety of health assessments, activity and behavior recognition, diagnoses, device performance metrics and any other automated signal processing or machine learning technique that might be used on the company’s human\xa0subject data. An example is development of a new index for orthopneic breathing based on physiology telemetry measured by sensors. This responsibility includes testing.', 'Responsibilities', '· Our customers and their patients depend on us to deliver technology that will forever change healthcare. We are literally keeping people out of the hospital. We are changing lives.', 'Senior Data Scientist', '· Bachelor’s degree from 4-year college program in science, engineering, math or related quantitative program', 'Required Skills', '· Familiarity with deep learning tools (e.g. PyTorch, TensorFlow, MATLAB NN Toolbox, etc.)', '· Mentoring Less Experienced Hires. This position is responsible to mentor new hires and interns as needed with respect to tools, procedures, and technology.', '· Written English fluency', '· Experience with biostatistical/clinical trials analysis approaches', '· Experience with wearable sensor data biosignal processing/analysis experience', '· Research Tool Development. This position is involved in developing tools and infrastructure for at-scale and repeatable analytics research, particularly using cloud and web resources.']

Ensuring our business units are prepared to deliver outstanding service to our associates and clients, the Adecco Group North America team provides a strong infrastructure through our corporate and shared services teams.', 'Advanced working SQL knowledge and proven experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.Demonstrated experience in building and maintaining reliable and scalable ETL on big data platforms.Solid working knowledge of Scala, Python and R.Thorough knowledge of building and optimizing data pipelines, architectures and data sets.Ability to perform root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable data stores.Strong project management and organizational skills.Ability to support and work with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.Ability to take responsibility for assignments and report on progress with minimal oversight.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or a related field plus five (5) years minimum experience in Data Engineering, business intelligence, data analytics or supply chain management required. MBA or graduate degree in a related field preferred.', 'Works with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs.', 'Participating in special projects and performs other duties as assigned.', 'Ability to take responsibility for assignments and report on progress with minimal oversight.', 'KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS & ABILITIES REQUIREMENTS:', 'MINIMUM EDUCATION & EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS:', 'Works with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems.', 'ESSENTIAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'Identifies, designs and implements internal process improvements, automates manual processes, optimizes data delivery and re-designs infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.', 'Builds analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics.', 'Ability to perform root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.', 'A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.', 'Adecco Group North America, through an impressive portfolio of staffing industry leading brands including Accounting Principals, Adecco General Staffing, Adia, Ajilon, Entegee, Lee Hecht Harrison, Modis, Paladin, Parker+Lynch, Pontoon, Special Counsel and Soliant is the world’s leading provider of Human Resources solutions.', 'We are the workforce experts delivering staffing and career service solutions to organizations and individuals across all industries. Collectively we harness the power of some of the greatest talent in the world. That talent and expertise allows us to do business globally and act locally with deep knowledge in niche areas.', 'Assembles large, complex data sets that meet functional and non-functional business requirements.']

The universe of real estate, however, is far larger than that of Capitol Hill or Hollywood – our readers include tech startup founders, developers, hedge funders, lawyers, brokers, architects and much more.', 'Experience using business intelligence tools (e.g. Tableau) and data frameworks\xa0', 'Design and maintain data tables', 'Collaborate with research and product development teams', 'Job Details:', 'To succeed in this data engineering position, you should have strong analytical skills and the ability to combine data from different sources. Data engineer skills also include familiarity with several programming languages and servers.', 'Develop analytical tools and programs', 'Undertake preprocessing of structured and unstructured data', 'Job Requirements:', 'Eligibility to work in the US without sponsorship', 'Explore ways to enhance data quality and reliability', 'Build data systems and pipelines', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.']

['Skills:', 'You have a Blessed Day ahead !!!', 'They are looking to add a Mid-Senior Data Engineer Miami, FL but fully remote to start.', 'or any referral will make my day and we will stay connected.', 'They is the largest operator of mobility, logistics hubs, and neighborhood kitchens in the United States, Canada, and has a growing presence in Europe.', 'Good experience with AWS cloud services, stream-processing systems and familiar with data platform..', 'Advanced SQL /NoSQL ,\xa0‘big data’ data pipelines / tools / Data store, working with structure and unstructured datasets.', '\xa0', 'Looking for minimum 5+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role. with good experience with data pipeline architecture, large, complex data sets, data delivery, AWS technologies, Data Management, BI Architecture, Product Development, RDBMS and non-RDBMS platforms', 'Our client, is creating a network of neighborhood hubs to bring you the goods and services you want, faster than ever before.', 'A Bachelors in Computer Science, or related technical degree is a must have.', 'Overview Customer Domain:', 'If you feel this description fits your experience and sounds like your ideal next challenging role, please apply here or send me a message to learn more !']

['', 'We are currently helping our client,\xa0USAFacts, with a search for a\xa0Data Engineer\xa0to join their growing team.\xa0USAFacts is a non-profit, non-partisan civic initiative privately founded and funded by Steve Ballmer. The aim is to give the American public free access to comprehensive, contextual, and unbiased government data. USAFacts aggregates data on spending, revenue, and outcomes from over 70 different government sources, spanning the federal, state, and local levels. USAFacts also publishes an annual "10-K Report” modeled on the form public companies file with the SEC, as well as an Annual Report that a shareholder would receive. The initiative encourages fact-based debate and civic engagement which we believe is essential to our democracy.', 'Some experience with ETL Performance Optimization methodologies.', 'Required Experience and Skills:', '1+ years of experience in using Spark/Big data.Some experience with ETL Performance Optimization methodologies.', 'Work sponsorship is not available at this time', 'Location\xa0- Bellevue, WA (remote until at least July 2021)', '1+ years of experience in data analysis using SQL.', 'Key Priorities and Responsibilities', '1+ years of experience in using Spark/Big data.', 'Hansell Tierney\xa0is one of the premier staffing and recruiting companies in the Pacific Northwest.\xa0Launched in 2001, we are a woman-owned business that serves and staffs Northwest organizations by doing things the right way, not just the easiest way.\xa0Hansell Tierney partners with candidates and clients to match the best candidates with interesting local opportunities.\xa0We navigate every relationship with the highest level of discretion and service while holding ourselves accountable to our promises.\xa0Our business thrives on our deep understanding of the job market and our ability to skillfully tailor our recruitment process to meet our clients’ unique needs.', 'Hansell Tierney\xa0', 'The\xa0Data Engineer\xa0is a key\xa0member of the core technology team that we are building in the Bellevue office to tackle our longer-term missions. This person will be responsible for building and maintaining data pipeline assets and increase the scale and efficiency through automation..', 'USAFacts', 'JOB SUMMARY:', 'Data Engineer', 'Build new and maintain existing data ingestion pipelines from external sources.Provide data engineering and modeling support to the engineering team.Provide on-call support to resolve any failures, optimize performances as necessary.Automate and continuously refactor existing technologies to achieve higher scale and efficiency.', 'Location', 'Automate and continuously refactor existing technologies to achieve higher scale and efficiency.', 'Duration\xa0- Permanent/FTE', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related technical field.', '\ufeffPreferred Experience and Skills:', '1-3 years of experience in data engineering with one of the major DB technologies like MSSQL, Postgres, Redshift, Teradata etc.', '1+ years of professional industry experience in software engineering in Python, Scala, or similar programming languages.', 'Ability to complete projects timely, accurately and with attention to detail, with continuous communication of progress updates to stakeholders.', 'Build new and maintain existing data ingestion pipelines from external sources.', 'Provide on-call support to resolve any failures, optimize performances as necessary.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related technical field.1-3 years of experience in data engineering with one of the major DB technologies like MSSQL, Postgres, Redshift, Teradata etc.1+ years of professional industry experience in software engineering in Python, Scala, or similar programming languages.1+ years of experience in data analysis using SQL.Ability to complete projects timely, accurately and with attention to detail, with continuous communication of progress updates to stakeholders.', 'Duration', 'Provide data engineering and modeling support to the engineering team.']

['Having tried and tested different approaches, the firm has committed to adopting a collaborative environment that will enable you to work closely with traders and developers, making the impact of your work visible from day one. This will enable your involvement in day-to-day discussions that shape the firm’s trading activities and transform quantitative methods into trading opportunities.', 'PhD or equivalent degree in Mathematics, Physics, Statistics, Operations Research, Machine Learning or a related discipline', 'Experience working on in-depth research projects', 'Top proprietary trading firm in the New York area is looking to hire a distinguished PhD Quant Researcher. Having built most of their own trading technology from scratch, this firm is a leader in the algorithmic trading space. You will be joining a team of PhD-level analysts dedicated to the data-driven development and improvement of trading models.', 'Strong practical computing skills in Python, C++, R and/or Matlab', 'Past hires have come from within the financial industry, national research labs, and straight from academia (either direct from PhD or a postdoc positions).', 'An open minded approach to solving complex problems', '\xa0', 'Exceptional problem-solving skills', 'Compensation is unprecedented and dependent on experience.', " What we're looking for", 'PhD or equivalent degree in Mathematics, Physics, Statistics, Operations Research, Machine Learning or a related disciplineUp to 5 years of experience post-PhD.Strong practical computing skills in Python, C++, R and/or MatlabExceptional problem-solving skillsExperience working on in-depth research projectsDemonstrated experience working with and drawing conclusions from large datasetsAn open minded approach to solving complex problems', 'Demonstrated experience working with and drawing conclusions from large datasets', 'Up to 5 years of experience post-PhD.', 'You will spend your day examining global markets and utilizing terabytes of trading data to build models and strategies for a variety of financial instruments and will be given a good level of freedom to design and push the firms systems to its limits. By leveraging your quantitative and computational abilities, you will play a key role in increasing the firm’s profitability.', "What we're looking for"]
